subject: RSSN
title: Elementary Russian 1
description: Explores the essentials of grammar, practice in pronunciation, acquisition of basic vocabulary, and idiomatic expressions of everyday Russian.

subject: RSSN
title: Elementary Russian 2
description: Continues RSSN 1101. Studies grammar and spoken and written forms of the language. Covers more advanced features of the language.

subject: RSSN
title: Intermediate Russian 1
description: Emphasizes further vocabulary building. Offers students an opportunity to master the fine points of grammar through written composition, prepared oral reports, and reading and discussion from contemporary Russian materials.

subject: RSSN
title: Advanced Russian 1
description: Builds on RSSN 2102. Continues further development of vocabulary. Offers students an opportunity to continue to master grammar and conversation through advanced reading, composition, grammar review, and listening skills. Whenever possible, offers students an opportunity to engage in local community activities to enhance communication skills and cultural knowledge.
